name: angular-foundation-libs
description: Tyris Angular Foundation Library - A modernized Angular library providing authentication services, HTTP interceptors, storage handlers, and base CRUD operations

scripts.pack: npm run build:prod && cd dist/angular-foundation && npm pack
scripts.pack:angular9: npm run build:angular9 && cd dist/angular-foundation && npm pack
scripts.pack:angular9-12: npm run build:angular9-12 && cd dist/angular-foundation && npm pack
scripts.pack:angular13-15: npm run build:angular13-15 && cd dist/angular-foundation && npm pack
scripts.pack:angular16-18: npm run build:angular16-18 && cd dist/angular-foundation && npm pack
scripts.pack:angular19-20: npm run build:angular19-20 && cd dist/angular-foundation && npm pack
scripts.lint: ng lint angular-foundation 2>/dev/null || echo 'Linting not configured'
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs && npx http-server docs/api -p 8080 -o
